Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Enacts the mental health assessment and record keeping for the coroner's office act
Summary: Enacts the mental health assessment and record keeping for the coroner's office act; requires the coroner, coroner and coroner's physician, or the medical examiner, to conduct a mental health assessment when a death occurs in such person's jurisdiction; requires death certificates list an underlying mental illness as the cause of death when a person commits suicide; requires life insurance policies to pay upon a suicide which the coroner, coroner and coroner's physician, or the medical examiner indicated an underlying mental illness as the cause of death.
LawCode: Amd §674, County L; amd §4141, Pub Health L; amd §§3203, 3209, 3220 & 4510, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to enacting the mental health assessment and record keeping for the coroner's office act
